item.title: Python_oracle
item.description: 环境问题 将连接oracle的python代码打包成exe文件给同事用时报错：Error: DPI-1047: Cannot locate a 64-bit Oracle Client library: “The specified module could not be found”. See https://oracle.github.io/odpi/doc/installation.html#windows for help windows
